conversations.body_text: Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your package has been shipped, but the tracking information has not been updated. Our colleagues at the U.S. warehouse are currently addressing this matter.

It’s been a month this is not right no one has reached out or anything nothing is even up dated it still sez it’s in California. This not not how u treat you customers 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will arrange for a replacement shipment and provide compensation as soon as possible!
